page.title: 08Favourite Games
page.content:
My favourite game is soldiers. I set up my 200 plastic World War II figures at home and make them start shooting. The German,Japanese and Italian soldiers are the 'baddies'and the British, American and Russian soldiers are the 'goodies'.Usually the goodies win.
I like playing horses with my friends.We have a skipping rope and put it round our shoulders.One person is the horse and one a rider.We run around pretending to jump over jumps and gallop through fields.We put up jumps that are hockey sticks and rounder posts.We can jump long jumps,short jumps and high jumps.We sometimes make water jumps by putting two long jumps spread out on the ground.We pretend there's water between them.
